title: Generate Date Range in Python | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will create a Python function that generates a list of dates between two given dates, demonstrating your understanding of the `datetime` module and list comprehension.

meta.title: Python Date Range Challenge | Datetime Module
meta.description: Learn how to create a Python function that generates a list of dates between two given dates using the datetime module.
meta.keywords: Python, datetime, date range, date list, programming challenge
